data: PED NEPH Hemodialysis CUA (Calciphylaxis) (Module)
Medications
Discontinue the following:  - calcium carbonate, calcium acetate, calcium citrate, vitamin D, alfacalcidol, calcitrol  - wafarin  - IV and PO iron
sodium thiosulfate
25 g, IV, hemodialysis 3 times/week, drug form: inj
12.5 g, IV, hemodialysis 3 times/week, drug form: inj
ondansetron
4 mg, IV, as directed, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
8 mg, IV, as directed, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
Laboratory
Electrolytes Urea Creatinine Panel
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, q2day for 6 day
Electrolytes Urea Creatinine Panel
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, qweek for 3 week
Calcium Ionized Serum
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, q2day for 6 day
Calcium Ionized Serum
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, qweek for 3 week
Phosphate Level
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, q2day for 6 day
Phosphate Level
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, qweek for 3 week
